amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of the Army to assume responsibility for the annual operation and maintenance of the Fox Point Hurricane Barrier, Providence, Rhode Island.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3729 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3729 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Chafee. (consideration: CR S4010; text: CR S4010) To direct the Secretary of the Army to assume responsibility for the annual operation and maintenance of the Fox Point Hurricane Barrier, Providence, Rhode Island.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3729 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3729 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Chafee.
